title: Practice Challenge
description:
Create a multiplication table for 7:
Use a for loop to display:
7 x 1 = 7
7 x 2 = 14
7 x 3 = 21
...up to...
7 x 10 = 70

Hint: Loop from 1 to 10, and each time display: console.log('7 x ' + i + ' = ' + (7 * i));
instructions:
Create a multiplication table for 7:
Use a for loop to display:
7 x 1 = 7
7 x 2 = 14
7 x 3 = 21
...up to...
7 x 10 = 70

Hint: Loop from 1 to 10, and each time display: console.log('7 x ' + i + ' = ' + (7 * i));

hints.text: for (let i = 1; i <= 10; i++) { console.log('7 x ' + i + ' = ' + (7 * i)); }

commonMistakes.consequence: Using i < 10 vs i <= 10 changes whether 10 is included.
commonMistakes.correction: Test your loop: for (let i = 1; i <= 10; i++) runs 10 times (1 through 10).

commonMistakes.consequence: for (let i = 0; i < 5; i--) makes i smaller forever, freezing the program.
commonMistakes.correction: Ensure the increment moves toward the condition becoming false.

commonMistakes.consequence: for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++); runs an empty loop, then the block runs once.
commonMistakes.correction: Never put a semicolon between the for() and the opening brace.
